title: You're now a champion. What is your selection quote?
body:
Title

"Well I hope I don't feed!"
or
"PentaKi- It wont happen again..."
{{item:3070}}

replies.body:
"NO FREE RP NO FREE SKINS AND NO I DONT WORK ON SERVERS"

rofl
"I'm probably not the best pick to get you out of bronze."
Looks like Riot Velocity is already taking care of it.
"We will twerk on your enemies. That will be fun." {{champion:61}}

"You dare call upon my power summoner?"

Oh wait summoners don't exist anymore...
"Who thought this was a good idea, that guy has an axe bigger than my torso"
"Please no, choose someone else, I DON'T WANT TO DIE!!!*starts crying*"
"For one cannot be fully successful without the peace of mind. Choose carefully, Summoner"
"Not the face! NOT THE FACE!!!"
"Five more minutes." *Long string of grumbles and curses*
"You don't know what you're getting yourself into. :)"
"Mistakes were made."
Bring me the booty. {{champion:114}} {{champion:39}} {{champion:92}} {{champion:254}} {{champion:143}}

"You chose the best champion... Obviously."
or
"You may want to change your mind. I don't want you to get banned for what is about to happen."
"*Quack... Quack,... QUAAAAAAAAAAAAAACK*"
"Communists detected on American soil... Lethal force engaged!"
Ugh. Can I at least finish my taco please?
"I swear I'm not that bad of a guy, It's my team's fault!"
I don't always finish my sentences, but when i do
"Seriously, me? You did want to win right?"

CAPTAIN HEDGEHOGIUS TAKES FLIGHT!

or...

HEDGEHOGIA, YOUR HEDGEPEROR HAS RETURNED
Moo
"Blood makes the grass grow."
"I swear, if i see a Garen on the loading screen, I am going to burn every bush on the map."
Wat?
*Don't blame me when they start crying, for no ones anus is prepared for me*

" So, How much RP did you buy for me? " 

OR

" Alright, give me your wallet, you payed to much already"

*Disclaimer, not hating Rito
"Meh."
"excellent choice summo- whoa, i almost forgot that i cant say that anymore."

"Psssh...nothing personel.....kid"


After my greatest idol Coldsteel the Hedgeheg*


*heavy sarcasm if you couldnt tell
"Justice.  At any cost."
I would make some large 15 minute motivational speech, and once the game started I would make my summoner feed.
where dat teemo

"Optimized for victory"

Or something equally cringeworthy

(Only when picked for a SR game)
"You're picking me to play Farmville?  Kill me now."

(Dominion)
"Go bot, lift the map, and carry the game."

(ARAM)
"Save your rerolls, I got this."

(TT)
"If only my friends were good at this (and reliably online), I could start playing ranked."
I really can't figure out what to say right now.
"DON'T PICK ME! I'M TRYING TO SLEEP!"
Okay everyone, let's all have a goo- ooh look a bunny!

"Haha, no I'm not shy... A kitsune merely quietly stalking his prey..."

Or

"Wisdom and the arts will prevail!"
Why? Because it's bloody fun!

Looks like their in for a...**Whale** of a problem!

or

Put me in coach, I got this!
"what how did I get here mOTHER"
"Sometimes i like cookies, other times I pretend to be one"

"Look man, YOU know this is a bad idea, I know this is a bad idea, hell everyone knows this is a bad idea

LET'S DO IT"
"Aw man, why'd you have to pick me?"
''Sounds dangerous, I'm out''

I swear if i am picked into a counter... oh hey 
OR
Time to go lag
NEVER GIVE UP! NEVER SURRENDER!
"You'll never know who I'll be."
